lead_paragraph: A post by Mr. Trump involving Star of David imagery and Hillary Clinton was traced to a message board known for anti-Semitism and white supremacy.

byline.contributor: Annie Correal and Sarah Maslin Nir contributed reporting.
byline.original: By MATT FLEGENHEIMER and MAGGIE HABERMAN

headline.print_headline: Report Traces Trump’s Star of David Posting
headline.main: Donald Trump’s Star of David Tweet Came From a Fringe Website, a Report Says

snippet: A post by Mr. Trump involving Star of David imagery and Hillary Clinton was traced to a message board known for anti-Semitism and white supremacy....
abstract: News website Mic traces Star of David imagery used in controversial Twitter posting by Donald J Trump to organization associated with white nationalism; posting, which shows Trump's political opponent Hillary Clinton standing next to symbol with caption Most Corrupt Candidate Ever! caused charges of anti-Semitism.
